title.rendered: Find Rooms for Rent in Chino Hills

content.rendered:
Chino Hills is a hidden gem in Southern California and is ranked 38th best place to live in California. Money magazine even dubbed it “one of Southern California’s best-kept secrets”! And it’s no wonder — the city has quality education, great job opportunities, excellent health care, and a strong community. If you’re thinking of moving to Chino Hills, this guide can help you get acquainted with the city’s location, average rent, safety, and even the best restaurants! Read on to find out where to find rooms for rent in Chino Hills.

Where is Chino Hills?

Chino Hills is at the corner of San Bernardino County and borders Los Angeles County, Orange County, and Riverside County. The majority of land in Chino Hills is — you guessed it — rolling hills, and the city was primarily rural until the mid-1970s.

Home to the Vellano Country Club, the city now boasts a wide variety of unique local establishments with a great balance of entertainment, fine dining, and outdoor activities for everyone. If you’re looking for restaurants in Chino Hills, we’ll let you in on a few local favorites towards the end of this guide.

Finding Rooms For Rent in Chino Hills

Find Rooms For Rent In Chino Hills

Many families and young professionals choose to live in this city because it has a suburban feel with a warm, welcoming, and safe community. Finding rooms for rent in Chino Hills is no problem with the many homes and apartments scattered around the neighborhood.

Average Rent in Chino Hills

Is Chino Hills safe?

With a crime rate of 9.6%, Chino Hills is the fourth safest city to live in out of 106 cities in California with a population of 50,000 to 100,000. Even so, it’s always smart to be prepared in case you find yourself in a situation that requires police, ambulance, or fire services.

Take note of these numbers:

  • 911 for emergencies! This will alert the authorities needed for any situation.
  • 909-364-2860 is the number for emergencies provided by the Public Works Department of the City of Chino Hills. They can provide materials, equipment, and aid to those in need.

You can also download these personal safety applications:

  • OnWatch
  • bSafe
  • Nixie

Public Transit in Chino Hills

1. Walkability

With a walk score of 23, Chino Hills isn’t the most walkable city there is, so your life will be much easier if you have a car to run errands in. And you can always book a car using ride-hailing apps like Uber or Lyft to make your stay in Chino Hills more convenient!

2. Roads & Traffic

There are four local highways that pass through Chino Hills: state routes 60, 71, 91, and 142. These highways can be of great help while finding rooms for rent in Chino Hills and when traveling as they connect Chino Hills with the different cities of Los Angeles!

3. Nearby Bus Stops

Chino Hill is served by Omnitrans and has one bus route: Bus Route 88. Bus Route 88 is a 60-minute curb-to-curb service that goes through Chino Hills, Chino, and Montclair. Bus tickets cost around $2.50 and the bus is open to the general public. You can learn more here and see the bus route here.

Restaurants in Chino Hills

1. Mes Amis

Mes Amis offers a variety of dishes that will make you fall in love with Middle Eastern cuisine. From vegetables to beef and chicken, the menu is filled with dishes made with high-quality ingredients and secret family recipes that go back generations. Don’t forget to try their mama ganouj, hummus, shish taouk, and always finish up with the mini baklava. Delicious!

View their Menu

2. Pizzaioli

Pizzaioli serves Italian cuisine with an American twist and prides itself on using the freshest and finest ingredients. Their menu includes homemade pasta, USDA prime steaks and chops, fresh seafood, and more! They also have an eclectic wine list to pair with your meals.

View Website

3. Squeeze In

Home to “the best omelets on the planet”, Squeeze In is a must-try restaurant in Chino Hills. With a huge menu full of delicious breakfast and brunch items, you’ll struggle to decide what to order! Their best-sellers are the Bomb Bacon Benny, Queen Maggie French toast, and the Conner’s Boss Burger. Squeeze In is a true crowd favorite and there’s something for everyone to enjoy.

View Website
Order Online

Parks in Chino Hills

  • English Springs Park is both a park and a catch basin in one. When it rains, the park’s lake is designed to hold extra water to avoid flooding in the area. But there’s also a lot to do in the park when the skies are clear! There are gazebos, picnic tables, sports courts, and a playground, so when you’re out and about looking for rooms to rent in Chino Hills, be sure to stop off here and make the most of all that this park has to offer.
  • Chino Hills Community Park spans 33 acres and has plenty of amenities and features that are open to the public. This large park has six ball fields, bullpens, batting cages, and a shaded playground. If you’re a sports junkie, this community park is the best place to watch games and have a hit!
  • Hidden Hills Park is the perfect place for a stroll. With beautiful scenery and a small play area surrounded by lush green trees and grass, Hidden Hills park is a great place to rest after a long day of finding rooms for rent in Chino Hills.

Shopping in Chino Hills

  • The Shoppes at Chino Hills is considered the main shopping mall in the city, with lots of retail and restaurants to browse. The open-air design is perfect for the Californian weather, and the mall holds concerts and events throughout the year. Check their website to find out what’s on.
  • Chino Hills Marketplace is another major shopping hub in the city. You can shop for clothes, home décor, and even vintage items while you’re finding rooms for rent in Chino Hills. The place is filled with daily-needs retailers and specialty stores, and you’ll struggle to leave the marketplace without a bag or two in hand!

Do you know what else Roomi does outside of helping its readers find rooms for rent in Chino Hills? With our ever-increasing lists of rooms and roommates across the world, we help you find your perfect match!

DOWNLOAD THE APP NOW!
